Back at the Ghostbuster HQ the team had returned from a routine job of eliminating a pesky spectre that was terrorising the inhabitants of an apartment complex.

As the team was unloading their equipment their PK metre’s went berserk, Egon Spengler the technology and ghost expert whip his out and saw the readings on it “you all may want to keep your packs on, there’s a strong energy of ghost activity in our home” he said causing them all to ready their proton guns “great maybe Slimer got out again” was the sarcastic tone of one Peter Venkman.

“not likely he’s still in his cage” Egon said pointing to the trapped ghost in the glass case, “there’s another ghost here” waving his meter all around the room before it got stronger at the stair’s “come on their a strong reading coming up from the stair’s”.

The others followed him up all wondering the same thing “ah I hope the recruit is okay” Ray Stantz said worried about you “yeah, I mean he must have been the first to respond to whatever invaded our home” Winston zeddemore asked as the recruit was the weapons specialist and had an arsenal of weapon at his disposal.

Their search lead them to the bedrooms were the reading were stronger than ever “in here is the source of origin” Egon said preparing to break down the closed door “maybe we might find him with his pants down busting a spook” Peter joked.

With a swift hard kick the door fell to the floor with a thud as all of them burst in weapons drawn seeing nothing out of the ordinary but the readings were hitting the roof, following the metre they say the downed naked form of their secretary Janine laying on the ground “scratch Rookie with his pants down, it’s our old sweet Janine who’s experiencing a wardrobe malfunction” Peter said looking at her naked form.

Egon and ray went to the down Janine and covered her with the blanket on the bed beside them, scanning her with the PK meter their found residual traces of ecto energy on her before she began to wake up.

“hmmm what? Where” she groggily said feeling weak for some reason “Janine are you alright?” Ray asked concerned for her “ugh I feel weak… why am I naked?” “that’s a good question why are you naked and where’s the new guy” Peter asked light on his usual sarcastic nature in a form of concern for both her and the rookie.

“Janine what happened before you woke up here?” Egon asked still scanning her with the device “I was doing what I usual do, taking phone calls and waiting for you guy’s to come back while the new guy catalogued all of the items you received over the years, when suddenly I felt a force enter me and all I felt was darkness before waking up here” she explained earning knowing looks from two of the ghostbusters “classic case of possession, something used Janine as a puppet to do who knows what to the recruit”.

“I know! He went to town busting the ghost out of Janine” Peter said earning a round of blushes from the team “I highly doubt a ghost would use Janine as a means of experiencing sexual activities, but finding her in a state like this does support the idea” Egon said after recomposing.

“So some spook took me for a ride on the New guy!” she shrieked out in the notion of unknowingly being forced into sex with some guy, “we don’t know yet, but we do know is that you were used to get to the Recruit”.

“Well if the ghost not only capture the rookie but also took him through there then it must have been one that knows the city better than we do”.

Before you could finish, Catherine flew into the cell and kissed you on the lips. You tried to escape the kiss, but Catherine hugged you. Her large lips were big enough to cover the lower half of your face, almost covering your nostrils.

When your struggles began to weaken, Catherine flew over the bed and released you. She looked down at you with a loving sneer as she said, "You're a great kisser... but I gotta go read up a few books and see if I can make our relationship more... permanent!"

She then flew off, laughing as she grabbed the bag of books.

After regaining your breath, you got up and tried to look for a way out.

===

After finding the old office of the chairman, Catherine began to read the books. she quickly learned where she was, how to turn back on the mandala, and how to take it over.

After uttering the spells to turn back on the Mandala and to make it accept her as its master, she gasped as a large amount of ghosts began to go through the fully re-activated mandala, their power filling her.

She fell to her knees as she began to scream as the power from the other ghosts began hurt her as her body altered itself to hold it all.

Her breasts and ass grew bigger, a single breast or asscheek much bigger than your head. Her arms and legs grew muscular. Her overall body grew more curvy.

Once the pain stopped, Catherine looked herself over. Her green dress was barely holding itself over her body, only staying together by her will.

She then looked over the books to see what spells stood out to her on a first glance.

One spell would put your body into a magical cocoon, but separate your spirit from your body. Another would bring her back to life, but ruin her connection to the Mandala. Another would simply give her a human form as a disguise, one that would even fool the P.K.E. meters.

As she turned a page, she saw a spell that would allow her to create and control minions out of ordinary objects. She thought of creating a large number of minions out of women's clothes, both to have minions to do her whims and to always have new clothes to wear.

"I'll get my minions later," Catherine said to herself as she sauntered back to you. On a mischievous whim, she will her body to look as it did before.

info.brief_description: This is a story about the Ghost busters and the cursed artifacts they find.
info.description:
This is a story designed to explore the world of the Ghost Busters , and there Fire house. During the recently released video game Ghost Busters you are tasked to collect cursed artifacts during your travels. This is an interactive story line about what those artifacts can do. Most of them don't do anything , others are really powerful and have a huge possibility of becoming a threat. Also do not feel constricted to only the video game. If you know of another artifact that you would like the ghost busters to become involved with please add it. Also it doesn't have to be limited to the Ghost Buster Movie Cast, it can be any .

Use proper spelling / No short additions , Don't be shy those are my only rules.
